In England, in the seven days to 31 August, there were 171,439 new confirmed cases (303.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 August, there were 184,821 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 7% (13,382 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 September is 6,019,976 (10,645.4 cases per 100,000 population).
